entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
